description:
Sheet music, classical music, opera and music for piano and solo voice. In PDF, sorted after genre and name of piece.

This is my collection of Jules Massenet's operas and works for piano and solo voice as of September 10th 2008. There are only four operas represented (he composed a wagonload of operas, around 40 or so), so I decided to include the song suite "PoÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¨me d'amour" and what I had of his "MÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â©lodies" as well.

In the torrent, the "MÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â©lodies" have been sorted alphabetically, and not according to in which of the original printed volumes of "Vingt MÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â©lodies" they were published (there are a total of eight volumes). I basically have a heap of loose sheets, and I'm not sure I can provide full sets. So beneath you'll see them listed alphabetically as well. If someone can provide a complete set of all eight volumes of "Vingt MÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â©lodies", it would be a happy-happy-joy-joy day for me :)
